title: LAG OMG THAT SERVER RITO PLZ
body: WHY SO LAGGING? IT IS NOT NETWORK PROBLEMS ALL MY TEAM GOES AFK AND 500 PING FIX. WHY? OMG. NOW I GO AFK BECAUSE IT IS WRITED "ATTEMPTING TO RECONNECT" AND CANT PLAY AND DONT GIVE ME THE 10 MINUTES TO PLAY PLZ. FIX THIS THANK YOU! :)

replies.body:
1-Forum italiano.
2-Se proprio devi esprimerti in inglese prima impara almeno le basi.
3-Spammare in caps lock nel forum non risolve nulla.
